turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I would like to get a pizza for the family tonight. Can you help me with this?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, sure! Where would you like me to order the pizza from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I love Costco pizza, you can get it there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, sounds good. What would you like on the pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The combination pizza will be perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is there only one size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I believe it only comes in one size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok perfect, what time do you want me to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 6:00 pm will be excellent.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, would you ask them to leave off the mushrooms?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok sure, I will ask them to leave the mushrooms off.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also, no onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it, no onions either.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh shoot, I just remembered, you cannot customize the combo, scratch that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh they don't?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right, it just comes as standard combination.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, sounds good. Do you want drinks with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please get us four cups of coke also.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so that's a combination pizza and four drinks. Great!
